title: Check Talent Contract Compliance
description: An agent needs to verify that a recently edited TV commercial complies with the lead actor's contract, which specifies their screen time and logo placement.

tasks.description: Retrieve the actor's contract and the final cut of the commercial.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accesses both the legal document and the video file.

tasks.description: Analyze the video to measure the actor's total screen time and check for logo proximity.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis shows the actor's screen time is compliant, but a brand logo appears too close to their face.

tasks.description: Flag the commercial for re-edit and notify the post-production team of the specific compliance issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a revision request with a clear explanation of the required change.
